### By Jack Wilburn

## Libraries

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(rvest)
library(tidyverse)
library(jsonlite)
```

### Grabbing the data

```{r}
art_html <- read_html("https://chicago.curbed.com/maps/public-art-map")
art_locations <- art_html %>% html_nodes("div .c-mapstack") %>% html_attr("data-cdata") %>% fromJSON() %>%
  .$cards %>% na.omit() %>% dplyr::select("title", "lat", "lon")
```
